Package com.antaler.utils.excel.annotations

Annotation Interface ExcelColumn

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(FIELD) public @interface ExcelColumn
Represent a column in excel

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Required Element
    Description
    int
    order
    order in column from left to right.
    String
    title
    title from column.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    ExcelDateFormat
    dateFormat
    Set format for date if the field type is LocalDateTime.
    String
    falseValue
    Text in the sheet cell for false value .
    String
    trueValue
    Text in the sheet cell for true value .

  • Element Details

    • order

      int order
      order in column from left to right. Mandatory
      Returns:
      order in column

    • title

      String title
      title from column. Mandatory
      Returns:
      title from column

    • trueValue

      String trueValue
      Text in the sheet cell for true value . Default Value "True"
      Returns:
      text if value was true
      Default:
      "True"

    • falseValue

      String falseValue
      Text in the sheet cell for false value . Default Value "False"
      Returns:
      text if value was false
      Default:
      "False"

    • dateFormat

      ExcelDateFormat dateFormat
      Set format for date if the field type is LocalDateTime. Default Value is ExcelDateFormat.NUMBER_SHORT_WITH_TIME
      Returns:
      format enum
      Default:
      NUMBER_SHORT_WITH_TIME
